definition[0]: (1984–) the younger son of Prince Charles and Princess Diana. He has a military career, and for a short time in 2007–8 he served as a soldier in Afghanistan until the media found out and he had to be sent home for safety reasons. He has sometimes done unwise things that have been reported in the news. For example, in 2005 he was criticized for wearing a Nazi costume to a fancy-dress party, and he apologized. His official name is Prince Henry.
